name: Chocolate Gift Set 'Holiday'
description: Premium chocolate gift set featuring a selection of artisanal chocolates from around the world. Perfect for special occasions and holidays.

name: Green Tea 'Spring Aroma'
description: Refreshing green tea with delicate spring flavors. Sourced from high-altitude tea gardens for exceptional quality and taste.

name: Ground Coffee 'Morning'
description: Rich and aromatic morning blend coffee, perfect for starting your day. Medium roast with notes of chocolate and caramel.

name: Natural Honey, 500g
description: Pure, unprocessed natural honey harvested from local beekeepers. Rich in flavor and perfect for sweetening teas or spreading on toast.

name: Oatmeal Cookies with Raisins
description: Homemade-style oatmeal cookies filled with plump raisins. Perfectly chewy texture with a hint of cinnamon.

name: Organic Lemon Tea
description: Refreshing organic herbal tea infused with natural lemon essence. Caffeine-free and perfect for any time of day.

name: Greek Honey Yogurt
description: Creamy Greek-style yogurt sweetened with natural honey. Rich in protein and probiotics, perfect for breakfast or as a healthy snack.
